name: Son Korsan
description: Son Korsan is a 3D MMO pirateship and war game. Fight for your own glory with your alliance against the enemies, set sail on an adventure, conquer new islands and rule the great seas!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Internet Connection Requirement
